title: Ornate Antique Type Specimens
content:
I’m looking for websites with images of ornate antique typography. Decorated titling letters and the like, something along the lines of:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/wiescher/fleurons\_initials\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203101/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/wiescher/fleurons_initials_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/wiescher/fleurons\_initials\_ot/")

Any leads would be greatly appreciated.

sven

 [‹ A good condensed serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203101/http:/typophile.com/node/49678 "Go to previous forum topic") [The difference between Garamond, Garamond Premier Pro and Adobe Garamond Pro? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203101/http:/typophile.com/node/49102 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sven s

comments.content: You might find something interesting in the [Woodtype Group](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929203101/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/woodtype/) on Flickr.
